GSD.product_version: versions from v3.16 to before v5.15.13
GSD.description:
NFC: st21nfca: Fix memory leak in device probe and remove

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.13 by commit 238920381b8925d070d32d73cd9ce52ab29896fe, it was introduced in version v3.16 by commit 68957303f44a501af5cf37913208a2acaa6bcdf1. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: NFC: st21nfca: Fix memory leak in device probe and remove
